msbt.message: I'm so glad it's sunny today! This is gonna be the best Fishing Tourney!
Numbers win the Fishing Tourney, but if you're after a big catch, you should fish near a big shadow. When you reel in a tough one and it's the very fish you were fishing for, it's twice as much fun!
When you just can't get a bite, you should pick yourself up and find a new fishing spot. Different spots have different kinds of fish to catch, right? I wonder what I'll catch today
I got myself a brand-new fishing rod just for today.I'm very choosy about my sports, and I only use the best equipment.<10_4 /> I hope I catch a lot with this thing.
If you want to compete in the Fishing Tourney, shouldn't you go talk to C.J. in the plaza?
